ygData.subject: RE: So how bad are the changes for us?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, I use alacrity on my puppy, but a puppy with ala plus the 20 delay dagger is QUICK. Now, if they hadden t taken SltW away from Shamans....well....I d
ygData.messageBody:
Well, I use alacrity on my puppy, but a puppy with ala plus the 20 delay
dagger is QUICK. Now, if they hadden't taken SltW away from
Shamans....well....I'd prolly still be bitchin =)

-----Original Message-----
From: Amy Pratt [mailto:sfpratt@...]
Sent: January 31, 2000 12:43 PM
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] So how bad are the changes for us?


From: "Amy Pratt" <sfpratt@...>

Think about this one. Why aren't high level enchanters complaining about
the no daggers thing?
Well, just cast swift like wind on your pet. Or the other speed spells at a
lower level. Who needs daggers?

Caelrie

> From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
> Shaman's pets got whacked hard too, no more giving them daggers to
decrease
> delay.
>
> Looks like everyone but Mages got hit by this nerf.
>
> Oh, enchanters are quiet cuz someone (ie Brad) over at Verant likes them a
> sh*t ton (IMO). I played a Shaman to 50, and just recently started an
> enchanter (19 now). Seems like shaman's got hit with alot more nerfing
tham
> enchanters have =)
>
> -Leod
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Garett [mailto:osmosis@...]
> Sent: January 30, 2000 5:51 PM
> To: eqenchanters@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] So how bad are the changes for us?
>
>
> From: "Garett" <osmosis@...>
>
> As stated by Verant :
>
> Enchanter's pets are affected by the same change as mage and necro pets,
> changing weapons will no longer decrease the attack delay. Enchanters tend
> to be a pretty quiet group, so I apologize for overlooking your mention in
> the previous messages.
>
> BLAH
>
